short_summary: The RCMP requires a hotel service for accommodations, venue space, meeting rooms, audio-visual equipment and catering services from May 19 to 29, 2025, for approximately 60 participants.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for a hotel to provide on-site accommodations, venue space, meeting rooms, audio-visual equipment and service and catering from May 19 to the 29, 2025 for approximately 60 participants.
